numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I wonder what conditions these countries are in.
2. The survey did not ask the opinion of people who are 25-39 years old.
3. I wonder why the survey did not ask the opinion of people who are 25-39 years old.
4. I wonder whether the survey asked all age groups in each country.
5. In most countries, the vast majority of people who are 15-24 years old have a more optimistic outlook on growth throughout the years.
6. The title is: Is Gen Z's activism making the world a better place?
